ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:08:20 [Issue ID 4000-206581] urn:comicvine:4000-206581 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 17:01:12. [Issue ID 2514373]
ComicInfo.Summary: It has been said that Magic is a science, one that we do not yet understand. But there are those who cross the plane of our reality and the mystical plane where magic can be used like any other science. And within these realms exist forces for both good and evil one protects while the other seeks to destroy our reality. The Disciples are the border guards of our existence and of a plane never before realized -- until now. With a wraparound cover.
ComicInfo.Title: The Magician, Part One
